org.ldaptive
Class ConnectionConfig

java.lang.Object
  org.ldaptive.AbstractConfig
      org.ldaptive.ConnectionConfig

public class ConnectionConfig
extends AbstractConfig

Contains all the configuration data needed to control connections.

Version:
$Revision: 2352 $ $Date: 2012-04-11 10:00:33 -0400 (Wed, 11 Apr 2012) $
Author:
Middleware Services

Returns:

getOperationRetry

public int getOperationRetry()
Returns the number of times ldap operations will be retried if an operation exception occurs. If this value is 0, no retries will occur.

Returns:
number of retries

setOperationRetry

public void setOperationRetry(int retry)
Sets the number of times that ldap operations will be retried if an operation exception occurs.

Parameters:
retry - number of retries

getOperationRetryWait

public long getOperationRetryWait()
Returns the operation retry wait time.

Returns:
retry wait

setOperationRetryWait

public void setOperationRetryWait(long wait)
Sets the amount of time in milliseconds that operations should wait before retrying.

Parameters:
wait - time in milliseconds to wait

getOperationRetryBackoff

public int getOperationRetryBackoff()
Returns the factor by which to multiply the operation retry wait time. This allows clients to progressively delay each retry. The formula for backoff is (wait * backoff * attempt). So a wait time of 2s with a backoff of 3 will delay by 6s, then 12s, then 18s, and so forth.

Returns:
backoff factor

setOperationRetryBackoff

public void setOperationRetryBackoff(int backoff)
Sets the factor by which to multiply the operation retry wait time.

Parameters:
backoff - factor to multiply wait time by
